snippet: Eric T. Schneiderman, the state attorney general, said that the automatic deletion of emails after 90 days would be turned off while the office formulated a new policy.
lead_paragraph: Eric T. Schneiderman, the state attorney general, said that the automatic deletion of emails after 90 days would be turned off while the office formulated a new policy.

headline.main: New York Attorney General Suspends Automatic Email Purge in His Office
